subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: A new gadget?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_8ab2e3f8-9f8c-4e9a-adf2-9476a889f1b0_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 I think it gives a clue to what the spirits is and how maybe it's easier =
for them to use an energy burst, and the K2 seems to be useful in giving a =
visual idication. Maybe the LEDS are better for seeing the quick pulse. Met=
ers with an analog movement my not to be fast enough to see the pulses.
 
 =
Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: vampire2kd@...: Thu, 2=
7 Sep 2007 16:33:19 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: A new gadget?




Heh yea I=
 remember chris fleming from the show Dead Famous. He also sells the K2 Met=
er on his site. I dont know why some people think its something that can es=
pecially enable one to contact the other side. Its an emf reader, Im not tr=
ying to be negative or anything. Im just pointing out its an EMF reader ins=
tead of having a digital/number indicator it uses lights. You can take a nu=
mbered EMF reader and accomplish communication that way also. All I am sayi=
ng is if you are the type who wants this but has to make a choice of having=
 money to eat for the next week or buy the meter, use what you have availab=
le to you. I have had successful two way communication using toys believe i=
t or not. Where you ask a question set toy off once for no twice for yes, a=
nd its worked. I think if there is someone willing enough on the other side=
 to speak to you, they are going to do it regardless of the device. If they=
 are intelligent enough theyll find a way to establish communication. Of co=
urse sometimes you can pick up stray voices where they may not trying to co=
mmunicate to you, you just capture it. So there are all kinds of communicat=
ion, well all know that. So no Im not saying the k2 is a rip off by no mean=
s, Im sure you can use it to establish communication, I have friends who ha=
ve the meter and swear by it. Im just saying if you have a regular numbered=
 EMF reader you can use that as well if you are needed the cash you have. R=
egards,T.L.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...=
> wrote:>> > Interesting, so it could be picking up signals below hearing l=
evels, like 50hz, and signals that are not sound. It might be interesting t=
o see what would be picked up in conjunction with a diode detector feeding =
a tape deck. Wonder if it's these magnetic impulses that are what modulates=
 the raw audio in the box to ceate a voice? Just a thought. > > Frank-S > >=
 > To: EVP-ITC@...: sunplex_chef@...: Thu, 27 Sep 2007 08:56:04 -0700Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] A new gadget?> > > > > > > Hey Guys> Here is the info take=
n straight off of the company's website. I have to say that it is a very af=
fordable meter and very rugged. I am by no means a professional in this fie=
ld, but I have to say that it is by far one of the most useful pieces I car=
ry. The company is K II (2) enterprises, I got mine off of ebay and had it =
in about 3 weeks do to back log in production. I hope this helps.> > Lynn> =
> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > Protect your family from ha=
rmful EMFs! > Measure the EMF (Electro magnetic Field) strength of every el=
ectrical device in your home, workplace or school; outdoor power lines, und=
erground lines and even when you travel and shop for appliances. Health con=
cerns about the negative effects of ELECTRO MAGNETIC FIELDS (EMF) from appl=
iances, power lines, and home wiring have caused the U.S. Government to iss=
ue a warning to use "Prudent Avoidance" to help reduce your exposure to thi=
s risk. > Since EMF's are everywhere it may be impossible to totally avoid =
them. The SAFE RANGE EMF METER from K-II can help you measure these potenti=
ally harmful fields and determine the safe range to help reduce exposure. I=
t also helps you determine which appliances produce high level emissions.> =
> > > > > > > FEATURES INCLUDE:> > > > > > > > > > > > Easy to read LED Dis=
play> > > > > 50 & 60 Hz operation> > > > > Five level milliGauss ranges> >=
 > > > For indoor and outdoor use > > > > > Durable plastic case> > > > > >=
 > > > > Operates for months on a single 9V battery> > > > > > Detects the =
ELF range (50 to 1,000Hz) & VLF range (1,000 to 20,000Hz)Frank Ratka <warri=
or18eii@...> wrote: > > > > > I haven't "played" with one of these yet. Wha=
t is the technology based on? What is it measuring to get the spikes?Regard=
s,Frank R.> ----- Original Message ----From: Lynn burton <sunplex_chef@...>=
To: EVP-ITC@...: Thursday, September 27, 2007 10:35:32 AMSubject: Re: [EVP-=
ITC] A new gadget?> > > Good morning all,> > Chris Fleming used one on the =
episode about the Manson murders before. I have had one for a while now, an=
d let me be the first to say that it works. I have had numerous two way con=
versations using it, as well as captured video evidence of these conversati=
ons showing that there is nothing around capable of giving off an EMF. The =
only issue that I have concern with is unlike EVP work or video ITC work yo=
u have no recognizable voice or image to positively correlate who the commu=
nication is coming from. In my case, I might ask the question "Are you Sylv=
ia, my mother, show me two spikes for yes and one spike for no" and the met=
er will spike twice for yes, but I have no voice or image I would recognize=
 to verify that is who is causing the meter to spike. The meter is a very u=
seful tool and I do not conduct an investigation or session without it by m=
y side, but like the rest of the tools in this field it has its valuable po=
ints as well as negative points. > > Lynn Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@ hot=
mail.com> wrote:> > > I saw on Ghost Hunters last night that they were usin=
g a "K2 Meter" to get yes-no answers from the unseen. I never heard of that=
 meter before. Frank-S> Invite your mail contacts to join your friends list=
 with Windows Live Spaces. It's easy! Try it! > > > > Building a website is=
 a piece of cake. Yahoo! Small Business gives you all the tools to get onli=
ne. > > > Be a better Heartthrob. Get better relationship answers from some=
one who knows.Yahoo! Answers - Check it out. > > > > Fussy? Opinionated? Im=
possible to please? Perfect. Join Yahoo!'s user panel and lay it on us. > >=
 > > > > > > __________________________________________________________> Ex=
plore the seven wonders of the world> http://search.msn.com/results.aspx?q=
=3D7+wonders+world&mkt=3Den-US&form=3DQBRE>

quick pulse. Meters with an analog movement my not to be fast enough to see=
 the pulses.<BR>
